text.title: Dutch sergeant may have gone to Syria to join ISIS, says Dutch Defence Ministry
text.head: Dutch sergeant may have gone to Syria to join ISIS, says Dutch Defence Ministry
Sources

list.item: Steve Almasy. "Dutch defense ministry: Airman likely left to join ISIS" — CNN , September 3, 2015
AFP. "Dutch soldier said to have joined Islamic militants" — Yahoo! News , September 3, 2015
Security Council. "Security Council Al-Qaida Sanctions Committee Amends Entry of One Entity on Its Sanctions List" — United Nations , May 30, 2013
